sentences.en: Dr. Pius Okong is an obstetrician from Uganda.
sentences.cn: 纰佑·欧康医生是乌干达的产科医生。

sentences.en: Obstetrician: Will the father be present during the birth?
sentences.cn: 产科医师：生孩子的时候孩子的父亲会在旁边吗？

sentences.en: He taught many pupils, including the famous surgeon and obstetrician William Hunter.
sentences.cn: 他还传教了许多弟子，包括著名的外科和产科医生威廉·亨特。
